!Master Luther: Did you come for the Mark of Searcher? The Mark is given to those who's ability for 'finding hidden things' is recognized. Every year, numerous Hunters, Scouts, Excavators and even some Assassins come to me in hope of receiving the *Test of the Searcher*. Are you also one of them? [Quest _225_TestOfTheSearcher 30690-05.htm|Say that you will try the Test of the Searcher]
